name: Alien Atonement
description:
Aliens have invaded earth!

Fight your way through hordes of enemy foot soldiers and defeat their Commander. 

You will encounter many human prisoners along the way, will  you rescue them in order to aid the war effort? Or will you be forced to sacrifice them to the alien overlords in order to push forward. Careful how you choose, for with each sacrifice the Commander becomes stronger.

Good luck soldier.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space to shoot/select, shift to sprint, and enter to pause game.
